meaningMnemonic: When you're number <kanji>two</kanji> in a <kanji>number in a series</kanji> you're <vocabulary>number two</vocabulary>. Not quite as good as being 一番, but take what you can get, you know?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
